nodes.text: Wan Sandage was a Devlikk podracer from Ord Radama who participated in the Boonta Eve Classic race on the planet Tatooine during the Naboo Crisis.

Wan Sandage appeared in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the first installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. In George Lucas' rough and first drafts of the 1977 original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actually contained a character named Count Sandage, a noble at the court of King Kayos on Aquilae whose role was to counsel the King to yield to the Galactic Empire only to betray the royal family later for Darth Vader.
